scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:zome && npm run test:lib
scripts.test:zome: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/zome/index.ts
scripts.test:lib: npm run build:client && npm run build:lib && TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/lib/index.ts
